A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Some parts I genuinely enjoyed\, others I groaned at.

It's a mixed bag...    one that I would have walked away with less mixed feelings if Finn and Rose's pointless busy work was stripped from the film. It fealt like they had no clue what to do with them so they just stuck them with crap that was never going to garner a grade (or real purpose).

Let the characters deliver the humor in character guys and lay off the physical and CG gags 

Leia's Marry Poppins moment...   You'll know when you see it. Didn't really sell me on that. Maybe for you it will.
